snippet: Pyongyang labeled as “nonsense” an investigation that said it had planted the mines in the Demilitarized Zone. It said Seoul was trying to drive up military tension.
abstract: North Korea denies planting three land mines that exploded in demilitarized zone maiming two South Korean soldiers; decries joint investigation findings and says it is attempt to increase military tensions.
lead_paragraph: Pyongyang labeled as “nonsense” an investigation that said it had planted the mines in the Demilitarized Zone. It said Seoul was trying to drive up military tension.

headline.main: North Korea Denies It Laid Mines That Maimed Soldiers From South
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: Dispute Over Land Mines
